name: payment-manager
description: A project to manage payments using Solidity and Hardhat

scripts.compile: Compiles the Solidity contracts using Hardhat.
scripts.deploy: Deploys the contract to the local Hardhat network.
scripts.deploy:sepolia: Deploys the contract to the Sepolia test network.
scripts.deploy:holesky: Deploys the contract to the Holesky test network.
scripts.deploy:mainnet: Deploys the contract to the Ethereum mainnet.
scripts.verify:sepolia: Verifies the contract on Etherscan for the Sepolia test network. Usage: npm run verify:sepolia <deployed_contract_address> <constructor_arguments>
scripts.verify:holesky: Verifies the contract on Etherscan for the Holesky test network. Usage: npm run verify:holesky <deployed_contract_address> <constructor_arguments>
scripts.verify:mainnet: Verifies the contract on Etherscan for the Ethereum mainnet. Usage: npm run verify:mainnet <deployed_contract_address> <constructor_arguments>
